title: AWS S3 Large GetObject Download
description: Detects S3 GetObject events with unusually large outbound bytes (simple exfil indicator).
sigma:
title: AWS S3 Large GetObject Download
id: RULE-019
description: Detects S3 GetObject events with unusually large outbound bytes (simple exfil indicator).
author: detpack-lab
status: experimental
logsource:
  product: aws
  service: cloudtrail
detection:
  selection:
    eventSource: s3.amazonaws.com
    eventName: GetObject
    bytesTransferredOut|gte: 50000000
  condition: selection
falsepositives:
  - Legitimate large downloads (backup/restore, data science workloads)
level: medium
tags:
  - attack.t1567
  - attack.exfiltration
